exceptions.tactic: apply power_decomp_factor with (f := f) (a := a) in H.
apply sum_power_binary_lt with (q := p) (r := power p 2) in H.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (p n : nat) (f a : nat -> nat), 0 < p <= q -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < power p 2) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) r) ≲ (power p 2 - 1) * ∑ n (fun i : nat => power (f i) r)" on hypothesis of type "forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, 0 < i < S n -> f 0 < f i) -> a 0 * power (f 0) p + ∑ n (fun n0 : nat => a (S n0) * power (f (S n0)) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => a (S i) * power (f (S i) - f 0 - 1) p) * power (S (f 0)) p + a 0 * power (f 0) p".
